name: Escape From Kindergarten
description:
Escape From Kindergarten

 This is a school-themed Platformer about a sentient Toy escaping from kindergarteners in a classroom. You will use various building blocks to fill in your escape path before getting caught to be played with.

Created by:

Mario Guerra - Lead Programmer w/ Interface Management

Elias Ekonomou - Lead Artist w/ Level Designing

Jurron Clayton  -  Lead Sound Designer

Antonios Savidis - Lead Producer w/ Level Programming

Brandon Spolsky - Lead Sound Designer w/ Level Designing

Patrick Faje - Lead Level Designer w/  Asset Management

(All credit to specified assets/soundtracks go out to their creators.)
